sqlMap.sql: select P.PICKLIST_ID, P.PICKLIST_NAME_ID, P.PICKLIST_DESC, P.ENTITY_TYPE, P.MULTISELECT, P.PICKLIST_NAME, P.SITE_NAME, P.CREATE_DATE, P.UPDATE_DATE, I.PICKLIST_ITEM_ID, I.DEFAULT_DISPLAY_VALUE, I.INACTIVE, I.READ_ONLY, I.ITEM_NAME, I.ITEM_ORDER, I.REFERENCE_VALUE, I.SUPPRESS_REFERENCE_VALUE, I.CREATE_DATE as PI_CREATE_DATE, I.UPDATE_DATE as PI_UPDATE_DATE from PICKLIST P left outer join PICKLIST_ITEM I on P.PICKLIST_ID = I.PICKLIST_ID where ((P.SITE_NAME = #siteName#) or (P.SITE_NAME is NULL))
sqlMap.select: and P.PICKLIST_NAME = #fieldName# and ((P.ENTITY_TYPE = #entityType#) or (P.ENTITY_TYPE is NULL)) order by SITE_NAME, ENTITY_TYPE, ITEM_ORDER
and PICKLIST_NAME_ID = #picklistNameId# and ITEM_NAME = #picklistItemName# order by P.SITE_NAME
sqlMap.update: update PICKLIST set PICKLIST_NAME_ID = #picklistNameId#, ENTITY_TYPE = #entityType#, MULTISELECT = #multiselect#, PICKLIST_NAME = #picklistName#, PICKLIST_DESC = #picklistDesc#, UPDATE_DATE = now() where SITE_NAME = #site.name# and PICKLIST_ID = #id#

update PICKLIST_ITEM set DEFAULT_DISPLAY_VALUE = #defaultDisplayValue#, INACTIVE = #inactive#, READ_ONLY = #readOnly#, ITEM_NAME = #itemName#, ITEM_ORDER = #itemOrder#, REFERENCE_VALUE = #referenceValue#, SUPPRESS_REFERENCE_VALUE = #suppressReferenceValue#, PICKLIST_ID = #picklistId#, UPDATE_DATE = now() where PICKLIST_ITEM_ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into PICKLIST (PICKLIST_ID, PICKLIST_NAME_ID, ENTITY_TYPE, MULTISELECT, PICKLIST_NAME, PICKLIST_DESC, SITE_NAME, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) values (#id#, #picklistNameId#, #entityType#, #multiselect#, #picklistName#, #picklistDesc#, #site.name#, now(), now())
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value

insert into PICKLIST_ITEM ( DEFAULT_DISPLAY_VALUE, INACTIVE, READ_ONLY, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_ORDER, REFERENCE_VALUE, SUPPRESS_REFERENCE_VALUE, PICKLIST_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE ) values ( #defaultDisplayValue#, #inactive#, #readOnly#, #itemName#, #itemOrder#, #referenceValue#, #suppressReferenceValue#, #picklistId#, now(), now() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
